ceo_buyer.justification: The buyer is Infinity Mining. The text states: 'Joe Phillips, Executive Chairman of Infinity Mining commented: â€œWe are excited to secure the Bogong Copper Project..."'

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The document announces the 'successful grant of the Bogong Project (EL9697)' to Infinity Mining. A direct grant of an exploration license to a company implies a 100% interest.

currency.justification: The transaction is a government grant of a tenement, not a commercial purchase. No monetary consideration or currency is mentioned.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The project was acquired via a government grant, not a purchase. No cash payment was made.

share_payments_raw.justification: The project was acquired via a government grant. No share payment was made.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The project was acquired via a government grant, not a commercial transaction involving payment.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The project was acquired via a government grant. No shares were issued.

issued_share_price.justification: The project was acquired via a government grant. No shares were issued, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The document mentions future plans for 'drilling in 2025' but does not specify a commitment in meters as a condition of the grant.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The document outlines future exploration plans but does not mention a specific monetary commitment required as part of the tenement grant.

exploration_commitment_desc.value: Infinity's immediate focus is to compile historical data, after which it will define targets for modern geophysical surveys, geochemical surveys, other on-ground exploration, and drill testing in 2025.
exploration_commitment_desc.justification: Under 'NEXT STEPS', the text outlines the plan: 'Once the database is verified and data is interrogated, Infinity will define the best targets for further exploration work, including modern geophysical surveys, geochemical surveys and other on-ground exploration programs. The highest-priority targets will be flagged for drill testing in 2025.'

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The document does not mention any Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) being acquired or retained as part of the tenement grant.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The document specifies 'approximately 16 km of strike length' but does not provide an area in units like km2 or hectares.

coverage_area_unit.justification: No area value was provided, only a strike length.

resource_size_desc.justification: The document mentions significant historical drilling intercepts (e.g., '54.9m @ 1.06% Cu') but does not refer to a JORC-compliant mineral resource estimate for the Bogong project itself.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The first paragraph identifies the company as 'Infinity Mining Limited (ASX: IMI)'.
